quote: "I'm not sure what perverted thing is going on here, but I want in!"
"It went in the right ear and left out the right."
"'Kay, I don't know how to talk to you."

"You know something? I really hate people! They're selfish, ignorant, loud obnoxious pricks, with basically no redeeming qualities whatsoever. I mean really, look at all they've achieved! Genocide, global warming, reality TV, and just a never ending parade of failures and fuck ups! They are, without question, a complete write-off of a species, and how dare you make me care about them!"

attrib: Akihiko Kayaba, Sword Art Online Abridged
quote: "Alright, now that I have your ears as well as your spines, allow me to indulge myself for a moment and tell you all what every content creator has always wanted to say to their audience: *FUCK! ALL Y'ALL!*"
"Some dreams won't come true on their own! You have to make them come true!"
"A bitter experience here and there is nothing I can't handle!"

attrib: Neptune and Nepgear, Hyperdimension Neptunia: The Animation
quote:
"Look, it's the famous sign you can't read from behind!"
"I think... most signs are like that."
